mapper.select: select * from (SELECT co.*,e.employee_name,cu.customer_name,p.proj_name,p.proj_line,p.proj_substate,cs.contract_stage,cs.contract_proportion, cs.contract_amount,if((cs.contract_stage is null),"9999-12-31 23:59:59",if((cs.acceptance_done=1 and cs.invoice_done=1 and cs.payment_done=1),"9999-12-31 23:59:59",cs.contract_time)) as contract_time,cs.contract_remark FROM contract as co left join contract_step as cs on co.id=cs.fk_contract_id left join customer as cu on co.fk_customer_id=cu.id left join customer_salesman as csman on csman.fk_customer_id=co.fk_customer_id left join project as p on p.id=co.fk_project_id left join employee as e on e.employee_gh=co.fk_employee_gh where csman.employee_gh=#{employeeGh} group by co.id,cs.id ORDER BY contract_time) as a group by a.id

select * from (SELECT co.*,e.employee_name,cu.customer_name,p.proj_name,p.proj_line,p.proj_substate,cs.contract_stage,cs.contract_proportion, cs.contract_amount,if((cs.contract_stage is null),"9999-12-31 23:59:59",if((cs.acceptance_done=1 and cs.invoice_done=1 and cs.payment_done=1),"9999-12-31 23:59:59",cs.contract_time)) as contract_time,cs.contract_remark FROM contract as co left join contract_step as cs on co.id=cs.fk_contract_id left join customer as cu on co.fk_customer_id=cu.id left join project as p on p.id=co.fk_project_id left join employee as e on e.employee_gh=co.fk_employee_gh group by co.id,cs.id ORDER BY contract_time) as a group by a.id

select * from (SELECT co.*,e.employee_name,cu.customer_name,p.proj_name,p.proj_line,p.proj_substate,cs.contract_stage,cs.contract_proportion, cs.contract_amount,if((cs.contract_stage is null),"9999-12-31 23:59:59",if((cs.acceptance_done=1 and cs.invoice_done=1 and cs.payment_done=1),"9999-12-31 23:59:59",cs.contract_time)) as contract_time,cs.contract_remark FROM contract as co left join contract_step as cs on co.id=cs.fk_contract_id left join customer as cu on co.fk_customer_id=cu.id left join customer_dic_data as cdd2 on cdd2.id=cu.customer_industry left join project as p on p.id=co.fk_project_id left join employee as e on e.employee_gh=co.fk_employee_gh where cdd2.dic_data_sort=#{sales} group by co.id,cs.id ORDER BY contract_time) as a group by a.id
SELECT id,fk_contract_id,sum(contract_amount) as contract_received FROM contract_step where acceptance_done=1 and payment_done=1 group by fk_contract_id;
SELECT * FROM contract_file where fk_contract_id=#{id} and fk_contract_step_id is null and file_type is null;
SELECT cf.* FROM contract_file as cf left join contract as co on co.id=cf.fk_contract_id where co.fk_project_id=#{projId} and cf.fk_contract_step_id is null and cf.file_type is null;
SELECT cs.*,e.employee_name FROM contract_step as cs left join employee as e on e.employee_gh=cs.fk_employee_gh left join contract as co on co.id=cs.fk_contract_id where co.fk_project_id=#{projId};
SELECT * FROM contract_file where fk_contract_step_id=#{id} and file_type=#{fileType};
mapper.insert:
insert into contract(fk_customer_id, fk_project_id, contract_no, contract_name, contract_money, contract_date, fk_employee_gh) values(#{fkCustomerId}, #{fkProjectId}, #{contractNo}, #{contractName}, #{contractMoney}, #{contractDate}, #{fkEmployeeGh})
SELECT LAST_INSERT_ID() AS id

insert into contract_step(fk_contract_id, contract_stage, contract_proportion, contract_amount, contract_standard, fk_employee_gh, contract_time, contract_remark) values
(#{contractStep.fkContractId},#{contractStep.contractStage},#{contractStep.contractProportion},#{contractStep.contractAmount}, #{contractStep.contractStandard},#{contractStep.fkEmployeeGh},#{contractStep.contractTime},#{contractStep.contractRemark})
mapper.select: select payment_done from contract_step where fk_contract_id=(select fk_contract_id from contract_step where id=#{contractStepId})
mapper.update: update project as p set p.proj_status="完成",p.proj_substate="完成" where p.id=(select co.fk_project_id from contract_step as cs left join contract as co on co.id=cs.fk_contract_id where cs.id=#{contractStepId})
